scene.name: NorthCorel
scene.p: At Kalm...

Redhead
Hey, listen to me! The Shinra troops are on the move.
The TV news said Rufus came up with 2 plans. One, is to launch a rocket into space containing Huge Materia......
Is Huge Materia really that destructive?
At Corel...

Man
Shinra soldiers came around sayin' they were gathering up all the Huge Materia.
I think they're gonna bring it here by coal train, from the Corel Reactor.

Big Man
Some Shinra soldiers went up to Mt. Corel. They said they're collecting Huge Materia to blow up Meteor!
Ya think they can really do it...? I'll bet the reactor destroys everything even before Meteor hits!
Cid and the others travel through the mountains to the Corel Reactor.

Soldier
You guys are...!
They fight and defeat the two soldiers guarding the door.

Cid
Guess we're safe for now...!
A train whistle sounds.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Da---mn!

Nanaki
Ohh!

Yuffie
Wa... wait!

Cait Sith
Wha... what is it, what is it!

Vincent
!!

scene.p: They get out of the way as a train exits the reactor.

Cid
Looks like they're takin' off with the Huge Materia in that train!

blockquote.p:
Barret
NO! You damn boneheads!

Nanaki
Did the Shinra beat us!?

Yuffie
What are ya gonna do!? Huge Materia!?

Cait Sith
Wha... you're not thinking about giving up...

Vincent
...go after them?

scene.p:
Cid
Hey, do you know who I am?
I'm Cid - that's who the hell I am! Now just let me handle it!
They run inside the reactor and another whistle sounds.

Cid
Hey, hey, hey, hey---!
They come out riding a smaller train.

blockquote.p:
Barret
How can they even drive this?

Nanaki
It sure helped having Cid here. I had no idea he could drive a train...

Yuffie
Pretty good for an old guy. I'm impressed you can move this thing!

Cait Sith
Way to go, Mister! You used to drivin' this thing too?

Vincent
I'm impressed. You can drive this too...?

scene.p:
Cid
Don't ask me... I don't know!

blockquote.p:
Barret
What!?

Nanaki
Wa...What!?

Yuffie
What!? You serious!?

Cait Sith
Huh? What'd you just say!?

Vincent
Wha... what...!?

scene.p:
Cid
Don't worry! I can handle this kinda stuff!
Two levers; one on the right and one on the left...
I see, just alternate the two levers up and down, right!?
Judging from the enemy's speed, I'd say it'll take about 10 minutes.
We're gonna fly!! Hold on tight!!

p.span: If they fail to catch up to Shinra's train...

scene.p:
Cid
DAMN!
Sorry! I couldn't catch up to them!
They walk into North Corel, which is unharmed.

Cid
Sorry... I never shoulda gave that Huge Materia to the Shinra so easily...

blockquote.p:
Barret
Can't keep regrettin' the past... It's the future we gotta think about now.

Nanaki
What are we going to do now?

Yuffie
No use baggin' on yourself! It's not like you, OLD guy!

Cait Sith
It's not all over yet. Cheer up!

Vincent
...Isn't it too early to give up?

p.span: If they catch up to Shinra's train in time...

scene.p:
Cid
All right! We're gonna jump!!
They jump to the other train and fight their way to the front.

Soldier Driving
What the! You... you guys!

Cid
All right--- Just hand over the Huge Materia!

Soldier Driving
Sh......
Whooooa----!
They fight off the soldier.

Cid
You got guts comin' after me!
I'll never forget you!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Got no time for that now!

Nanaki
We got it going, but what about the brakes?

Yuffie
Forget about the Huge Materia, WE'RE the ones in deep trouble!

Cait Sith
What are we gonna do, kill off the engineer!?

Vincent
Hit the brakes, Chief.

scene.p:
Cid
I KNOW, already! Just shut up and keep quiet! If we keep this up, we'll crash right into North Corel!
Let's see... If we alternately use the levers to accelerate, ...
It should brake if we move the levers up or down simultaneously!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey, it's not working!

Nanaki
We're gaining speed!

Yuffie
What are you doin' accelerating!?

Cait Sith
Hey---------WAIT! ...other way, other way, other way!

Vincent
Isn't it... the other way?

scene.p:
Cid
@#*#! The other way!? Just watch, this time, I'll...

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey... HEY HEY!!

Nanaki
WHOOOOOO----A!!

Yuffie
Get serious, you old man!

Cait Sith
No... DON'T----!!

Vincent
......!!

p.span: If Cid slows the train down in time...

scene.p: The train stops just at the entrance to North Corel.
Received Key Item "Huge Materia"!

Older Woman
You sure are brave. I'm impressed!

Man
You guys are really something!

Big Man
Aren't you the ones that stopped the Shinra Train?
The Shinra was just about to destroy our lives again...

Man
To you it may be a junk yard, but to us its home.
If Barret is in the party, he will instead say:
It might be full of junk, but this is the only home we got, Barret!!

Barret
Of... of course! We're all born and raised in the coal mines!!
No matter how tough it gets, our hearts burn bright red like coal!

Man
To hell with Meteor! We're Coal Miners, ain't we?
We'll dig a deep tunnel and hide from the Meteor!

Big Man
That's it!
Hey, kid! How about givin' somethin' to these guys fightin' the Shinra?
A kid comes down from above.

Kid
I got it out of the well. Isn't it an amazing rock!!
Received "Ultima" Materia!

Man
Must've been a horrific battle. You have scars all over your body.
I already talked to the Inn's owner, today you can rest for free.
Cid and the others spend the night.
The next day, inside the crumbling house...

Man
I don't want to die, but who can stop Meteor?

Woman
Is Meteor really going to crash down on us......?
I'm still young...... I'll never marry again.
This memento is all I have left of my husband... I'll give it to you if you'll please stop Meteor...
Received "Catastrophe"!

Little Girl
Hey, what's a Meteor?
Back outside...

Man
Whenever I look up in the sky, I see Meteor staring me right in the face......
If you're comin' down, then hurry up do it!! 'Cause I'm gonna kick the $#@& outta ya!

Big Man
I figure if I stay alive long enough, something good's bound to happen.
Inside a tent...

Old Man
What the? Don't get hit by the train!

Black Woman
With Meteor coming, I guess it won't make any difference...
In another tent...

Woman
You saved my life. Not that I have much longer to live anyway...

Kid
When I grow up, I'm gonna travel the world collecting glowing stones!

p.span: If Cid fails to slow the train down in time...

scene.p:
Cid
Oh ^%$#&$! We're gonna crash into North Corel!
The train crashes into North Corel. Cid comes to in the inn, rolling off the bed.

Innkeeper
You all right?
Some townspeople carried you here so the Shinra wouldn't find you.
How much more will they have to destroy before they're satisfied!?
Isn't anyone brave enough to stick it to Shinra?
Cid and the others step outside to see the damage.

Cid
^$#@%$! We couldn't stop the train...

blockquote.p:
Barret
I did it again... I can't keep up with this.

Nanaki
I could never forgive Shinra!

Yuffie
I'd be sad if this place was my hometown...

Cait Sith
We got into this situation because we goofed...

Vincent
A spectacular sight...

scene.p:
Man in Hardhat
Hey, what's this world coming to...?
Even the Gold Saucer is closing. So does that mean there's no time to be playing around?
Inside the crumbling house...

Man
The town is in shambles...... and Meteor is falling our way...

Older Woman
All we have left is our love for each other.

Woman
Is Meteor really going to crash down on us......?
I'm still young...... I'll never marry again.
This memento is all I have left of my husband... I'll give it to you if you'll please stop Meteor...
Received "Catastrophe"!

Little Girl
Hey, what's a Meteor?

Weapons Shopkeeper
My store was all right!

Big Man
We've lost everything... Now we have to start again from '1'... no, from '0'.

Man
God, what have we done...?
Well, no use just sitting around talking about it. What can we do to get things back to normal?

Man 2
While you guys were relaxing, Shinra troops took the Huge Materia.

Old Man
Um... where was the next train station?

Black Woman
Seeing that train got Grandpa more excited than I've seen him for some time.

Kid
I got a glowing rock from the well.
I'll sell it to you for 50000 gil!

Cid
- Buy it
- Don't buy it
Received "Ultima" Materia!

Kid
Yay! My house is finished!!
Or, if you don't have enough money:
You don't have enough money! Don't try to take advantage of me just because I'm a kid!!

Kid
I wish someone would buy this rock off of me...
Back on the Highwind...

Cid
What's next? Shall we head for Fort Condor?

Barret
Huh? Mr. Leader, what's next!?

Nanaki
We'll do our best for Cloud and you.
......And Aerith, too.

Vincent
......Don't expect anything else from me except fighting beside you.
I don't have any comforting words.
Of course, I don't believe you're the type of guy who needs kindness from other's......
It is possible to do Fort Condor first and Corel second, in which case the dialogue is different:

Cid
There's only one more Huge Materia the Shinra needs... That's the one at the Underwater Reactor.

Yuffie
We've got to hurry and stop 'em!!

Cid
With us always in their face, even the Shinra's gotta be getting tired of it all.
We have to hurry that much... ...right now I'm more worried about him than anything else!

Vincent
Cloud...

Cid
Yeah, and I'm worried about Tifa, too.
Let's go see what's going on at Mideel...
